summary: Turns entire Skyrim world into a big landscaped garden - really beautiful and wild! Gives a new look to many areas in Skyrim to explore and re-explore. * Recommended for Screenarchers!
descriptionHtml:
Another simple mod that can make a big difference - from the author of \"Grass on Steroids\". This mod is proven to have MINIMAL FPS impact on your gameplay compared to other grass mods (read on below settings).

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/685/grassificationbanner160.jpg/][IMG]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/4609/grassificationbanner160.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Decription:
Grassification adds grass to areas without grass and makes all grass growth appear more natural, realistc and stunningly beautiful. I mixed and matched different grass-type flora to create a landscaped-garden look while still keeping the characteristic of every region unique. 
This is ideal for people who love taking screenshots and for those who simply want to have the most beautiful settings in their game!

___________________________________________________
Requirements:
For version 1.0, You need to install first Skyrim Flora Overhaul by Vurt (latest version). You can download it from this link http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/141

(Optional RECOMMENDED) For better performance and maximum beautification effect, it is highly recommended to use it in tandem with my other mod [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33582]\"Grass on Steroids Regular edition for SFO\"[/url]

___________________________________________________
Settings (important)
In your skyrim.ini file, insert the below lines:

[Grass]
bAllowLoadGrass=0
bAllowCreateGrass=1
bDrawShaderGrass=1   
iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=7   ;this has to be set at 7
iMinGrassSize=75

The last line, iMinGrassSize=75, is the density setting. The optimal value is 75 - when used with the mod  \"Grass on Steroids SFO edition\"  you will get exactly the same density and look as my screenshots. Set this at a lower number if you want even thicker grass (at the expense of FPS loss) and to around 100-128 for faster performance.

Other mods used in the screenshots:
Skyrim Flora Overhaul - by Vurt
Lush Trees and Grasses - by Opticshooter
Purewaters
Climates of Tamriel
Grass on Steriods - by me ;-)

PLEASE FEEL FREE TO UPLOAD YOUR SCREENSHOTS ON THE IMAGES SECTION. Enjoy!

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33784-3-1369400005.jpg[/img]

[b]ENB WAS NOT USED IN THE SCREENSHOTS BELOW[/b] TO EMPHASIZE HOW MUCH GRASSIFICATION CAN BEAUTIFY YOUR VANILLA SKYRIM JUST BY ITSELF
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/213/tesv2013032316142788.jpg/][IMG]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/6097/tesv2013032316142788.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
The Whiterun Tundra has always been a dull, monotonous sea of grass...until Grassification comes along and changes things!

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/109/tesv2013032317090666.jpg/][IMG]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/6810/tesv2013032317090666.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
The grass in the Aspen forests look sexy when they\'re tall! (used with Grass on Steroids mod)

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/547/tesv2013032316572570.jpg/][IMG]http://img547.imageshack.us/img547/8258/tesv2013032316572570.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
The thermal pools, overgrown by grass

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/689/tesv2013032301051140.jpg/][IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/9426/tesv2013032301051140.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
A sea of blue and purple lupins from vurt\'s Skyrim Flora Overhaul, in the background are the new pine tree textures from Lush Trees and Grass by Opticshooter.

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/41/tesv2013032317002330.jpg/][IMG]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/2845/tesv2013032317002330.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Moonlit landscape near Windhelm.


(Disclaimer - Skyrim Grassification mod may cause FPS lags on a hardware-impaired PC - if used without [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33582]Grass on Steroids[/url] mod)
